item.title: ScioXR
item.description: Propter D.O.O are developing ScioXR, a VR/AR software platform that delivers immersive learning games and experiences that empower students to learn about the world around them. Technology around us has gone a long way since the beginning of our millennium. Yet, most of our classrooms remain more or less the same as they were at the end of the 20th century. This especially applies to the STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering and Mathematics) field.
